vulnerability_findings.name: calls-loop
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(token.call(id, from, _tos[i], value)); // added require statement to check return value
vulnerability_findings.message:
Airdrop.transfer has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(token.call(id,from,_tos[i],value)) (patch_11.sol#13)
